ygData.subject: Re: Source for Combine Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: The thing I like about combines better than the other weapons is the resale value.  You purchase a Dragoon Dirk now for 40 plat, in a couple of months when you
ygData.messageBody:
The thing I like about combines better than the other weapons is the resale
value. You purchase a Dragoon Dirk now for 40 plat, in a couple of months
when you get tired of it you won't get much of a return because of players
getting them and flooding the market. This has already happened with Mino
Axes - they used to sell for over 10pp a piece when I first started. Now
you can get them for 3 - 4pp. Combines you can always sell back for about a
20% loss, and can sell to another player for a little less than what you
paid for it.

> ----------
> From: Codo the Mysterious[SMTP:codo@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:05 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons
>
> From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
> Yes, it's called Dvinn. His Dragoon Dirk is better than any Combine weapon
> except a Two Handed Sword. You can also sometimes find the dirks for sale.
> My friend bought one for 40plat last night...
>
> Lulen
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
